bodydiv.p: An entity shall classify a liability as current when:

li.p: it expects to settle the liability in its normal operating cycle;
it holds the liability primarily for the purpose of trading;
the liability is due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or
it does not have the right at the end of the reporting period to defer settlement of the liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

bodydiv.p: An entity shall classify all other liabilities as non‑current.
